nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.binding

Class DataBinder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.binding.DataBinder<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanBinder, BeanCollectionBinder, MapBinder, PropertyBinder, SimpleCollectionBinder

    public abstract class DataBinder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Has the capacity to read/store values from/to an object
    Author:
    luis
    See Also:
